casebody.data:
Adam Gaski v. Gaski Realty, Inc., et al. (11336)

Heiman, Freedman and Schaller, Js.

Argued February 23 — decision released March 16, 1993 Steven W. Varney, for the appellants (defendants). Constance L. Epstein,■ with whom, on the brief, were John Stephen Papa, Michael McDonnell, Ruth A. Tower and Bryan Meccariello, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
